price: (Ànábì Mūsā) sọ pé: “Ẹ ju (tiyín) sílẹ̀ (ná).” Nígbà tí wọ́n jù ú sílẹ̀, wọ́n lo àlùpàyídà lójú àwọn ènìyàn. Wọ́n sì ṣẹ̀rùbà wọ́n. Àní sẹ́ wọ́n pidán ńlá.
arabic: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla alqū falammā alqaw saḥarū aʿyuna al-nāsi wa-is'tarhabūhum wajāū bisiḥ'rin ʿaẓīmin
